name: SpiritSwap
description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

en.name: SpiritSwap
en.description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

fr.name: SpiritSwap
fr.description: SpiritSwap est un protocole market maker automatisé sur le réseau Fantom. Il s'agit d'un agrégateur de liquidités décentralisé avec lequel les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter leurs actifs dans plusieurs pools de liquidités différentes et gagner une partie des frais.

es.name: SpiritSwap
es.description: SpiritSwap es un creador automático de mercado en la red Fantom. Es un agregador de liquidez descentralizado donde los usuarios pueden agregar sus activos a varios pools de liquidez diferentes y ganar parte de las comisiones.

de.name: SpiritSwap
de.description: SpiritSwap ist ein automatisiertes Market-Maker-Protokoll im Fantom-Netzwerk. Es ist ein dezentraler Liquiditätsaggregator, bei dem Nutzer ihre Vermögenswerte zu verschiedenen Liquiditätspools hinzufügen und Gebühren verdienen können.

pt.name: SpiritSwap
pt.description: SpiritSwap é um protocolo AMM na rede Fantom. É um agregador descentralizado de liquidez onde os usuários podem adicionar seus ativos em diferentes pools de liquidez e receber taxas por isto.

el.name: SpiritSwap
el.description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

tr.name: SpiritSwap
tr.description: SpiritSwap, Fantom ağındaki otomatikleştirilmiş bir piyasa yapıcı protokolüdür. Kullanıcıların varlıklarını birkaç farklı likidite havuzuna ekleyebilecekleri ve ücret kazanabilecekleri merkezi olmayan bir likidite toplayıcıdır.

vi.name: SpiritSwap
vi.description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

zh.name: SpiritSwap
zh.description: SpiritSwap 是个在 Fantom 网络上的自动做市商协议。它是个去中心化的流动性聚合器。用户可以将他们的资产添加到各个不同的流动性池中以赚取费用。

hi.name: SpiritSwap
hi.description: SpiritSwap Fantom नेटवर्क पर एक स्वचालित बाजार निर्माता प्रोटोकॉल है। यह एक विकेन्द्रीकृत तरलता एग्रीगेटर है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी संपत्ति को कई अलग-अलग तरलता पूल में जोड़ सकते हैं और शुल्क कमा सकते हैं।

ja.name: SpiritSwap
ja.description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

id.name: SpiritSwap
id.description: SpiritSwapはFantomネットワーク上の自動マーケットメーカープロトコルです。分散型流動性アグリゲーターであり、ユーザーは自分の資産をいくつかの異なる流動性プールに入金し手数料を得ることができます。

ru.name: SpiritSwap
ru.description: SpiritSwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.
